smg.text: Dry. Fine. Haze during the day. Force 2 to 4 east to northeasterly winds.
Mainly fine. Force 3 to 4 east to northeasterly winds.
Mainly fine. Force 3 to 4 east to northeasterly winds, occasionally force 5 with gusts.
Temperature falling slightly. Fine apart from cloudy periods. Force 3 to 5 east to northeasterly winds, becoming northerlies with gusts.
Cold and dry. Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Force 4 to 5 northerly winds with gusts.
Cold and dry. Cloudy apart from sunny intervals. Force 3 to 5 north to northeasterly winds with gusts.
Cold and dry. Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Force 3 to 4 north to northeasterly winds.
